<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Limited">[Dawnflower's Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=1234)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Kingmaker</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Good" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=83" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 71</row>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 unattended, non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) object of 1 Bulk or less
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

The object glows with soft golden light that lays bare the truth, reveals hidden objects, and shines supernatural light on false orders. The object casts [bright light](/Rules.aspx?ID=407) in a 60-foot radius (and [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=408) for the next 60 feet). Within the area of bright light, Perception checks to locate hidden objects (including secret doors but not traps), Will saves to resist [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163) illusions, and Will saves to resist effects placed by evil creatures that inflict the [controlled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=6) condition all gain a +2 status bonus. This light suppresses magical [darkness](/Traits.aspx?ID=39) of your _Dawnflower's light_ spell's level or lower.

 Finally, the supernatural light created by this spell is similar to sunlight, and while it can't damage creatures normally harmed by sunlight, it does make them uncomfortable so that they suffer a –2 status penalty to saves versus [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effects while in the area of bright light.

---
**Heightened (7th)** The status bonus increases to +3.

**Heightened (9th)** The status bonus increases to +4.
name: Dawnflower's Light
